name: The Only Platform
description:
This is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "only one". This is my first time making a game in such a short amount of time, so any feedback would be amazing!

There is only one platform! Once it disappears, it will move to a new location. Jump just before it fades away and react quickly!

UPDATES:

Added visual indicator for jumping and added volume setting for music.

Added the ability to fall faster by pressing down, readjusted the height difference of platforms, made highscore visible while playing the game. 

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys (press down to fall faster)

Jump: W, UP, or SPACE (You can triple jump)

Retry/Play: Enter

Back/Pause: Escape
